movie.title: Valiant
movie.description_intro: VALIANT chronicles the unprecedented inaugural season of the Vegas Golden Knights hockey team as they climb to the top of the NHL standings and make it to the Stanley Cup Finals, all against the backdrop of a city reeling from the worst mass shooting in U.S. history.
movie.description_full: VALIANT chronicles the unprecedented inaugural season of the Vegas Golden Knights hockey team as they climb to the top of the NHL standings and make it to the Stanley Cup Finals, all against the backdrop of a city reeling from the worst mass shooting in U.S. history.

movies.title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
movies.title_english: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
movies.title_long: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man (2009)
movies.summary: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.
movies.description_full: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.
movies.synopsis: With his wisecracking one-of-a-kind style of comedy, Kevin Hart pokes fun at everyone - even his audience.

movies.title: Strong Island
movies.summary: Examining the violent death of the filmmaker's brother and the judicial system that allowed his killer to go free, this documentary interrogates murderous fear and racialized perception, and re-imagines the wreckage in catastrophe's wake, challenging us to change.
movies.description_full: Examining the violent death of the filmmaker's brother and the judicial system that allowed his killer to go free, this documentary interrogates murderous fear and racialized perception, and re-imagines the wreckage in catastrophe's wake, challenging us to change.
movies.synopsis: Examining the violent death of the filmmaker's brother and the judicial system that allowed his killer to go free, this documentary interrogates murderous fear and racialized perception, and re-imagines the wreckage in catastrophe's wake, challenging us to change.

movies.title: Take Light
movies.summary: TAKE LIGHT is a look at the tangled wires of Nigeria's electricity crisis, told through the everyday trials and tribulations of a charismatic electrician.
movies.description_full: TAKE LIGHT is a look at the tangled wires of Nigeria's electricity crisis, told through the everyday trials and tribulations of a charismatic electrician.
movies.synopsis: TAKE LIGHT is a look at the tangled wires of Nigeria's electricity crisis, told through the everyday trials and tribulations of a charismatic electrician.

movies.title: The Peacekeepers
movies.summary: With unprecedented access to the United Nations Department of Peacekeeping, The Peacekeepers provides an intimate and dramatic portrait of the struggle to save "a failed state." The film follows the determined and often desperate manoeuvres to avert another Rwandan disaster, this time in the Democratic Republic of Congo (the DRC).
movies.description_full: With unprecedented access to the United Nations Department of Peacekeeping, The Peacekeepers provides an intimate and dramatic portrait of the struggle to save "a failed state." The film follows the determined and often desperate manoeuvres to avert another Rwandan disaster, this time in the Democratic Republic of Congo (the DRC).
